title: Our water our future
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Sustainability and Environment, production company

description: This documentary provides an entertaining, informative and educational insight into how Victoria's homes, farms, environment and industries depend on a secure water supply. It explores the contrasts between rural and urban Victoria, demonstrating that water security is a statewide issue affecting everyone. Hosted by Arron Wood, Environmental Scientist.
